s: July 8, 2024 - Amazon river dolphins are found in the Amazon, Orinoco, and Tocantins-Araguaia River Basins. Their presence has been confirmed in Bolivia, Brazil, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, and Venezuela1, and more recently there is photographic evidence of their presence in Guyana.
